mapper.sql: reviewer_id, reviewed_id, response_ordinal, stars, initial_comments, modified_comments, timestamp, twice_comment, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, p1.user_name AS reviewer_name, p2.user_name AS reviewed_name, c.response_ordinal, c.stars, c.initial_comments, c.modified_comments, c.timestamp, c.twice_comment, c.create_time FROM Comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT person_id, user_name FROM person ) p1 ON c.reviewer_id = p1.person_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT person_id, user_name FROM person ) p2 ON c.reviewed_id = p2.person_id;
SELECT c.reviewer_id FROM Comment c JOIN person p ON p.person_id = c.reviewer_id WHERE p.user_name = #{name}
SELECT c.reviewed_id FROM Comment c JOIN person p ON p.person_id = c.reviewed_id WHERE p.user_name = #{name}
